column3: 1. Do you consider yourself part of a gaming community?
column4: 2. What kind of a gamer you think you are?
column5: 3. Do you mostly play games that are single-player or multiplayer?
column6: 4. How many friends do you play with?
column7: 5. Do you participate in time-limited in-game events?
column8: 7. How much time do you spend playing games on a daily basis?
column9: 8. What platforms do you game the most?
column10: 9. Are you most likely to spend on promotions like discounts or bundles? (example: Steam sales, skin bundles, etc)
column11: 12. What is your monthly allowance for games?
column12: 13. What are you most likely to buy in a game with real money?

column15: 14. Rate what influences you in spending for games. [Content Creators]
column16: 14. Rate what influences you in spending for games. [Social Media]
column17: 14. Rate what influences you in spending for games. [Franchise Loyalty]
column18: 6. Do you buy game merchandise? (plushies, posters, T-shirts, dakimakuras, mousepads, ETC)
column19: 11. How much budget do you have for food daily?
column20: 10. How much do you spend on transportation daily?
column21: 15. Have you failed a subject before from high school to today?
